005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
017
018import java.util.Arrays;
019import java.util.List;
020import java.util.stream.Collectors;
021import java.util.stream.Stream;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024
025/**
026 * Implements <a href=
027 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-concat">fn:concat</a>.
028 */
029public final class FnConcat {
030  @NonNull
031  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
032      .name("concat")
033      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
034      .deterministic()
035      .contextIndependent()
036      .focusIndependent()
037      .argument(IArgument.builder()
038          .name("arg1")
039          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
040          .zeroOrOne()
041          .build())
042      .argument(IArgument.builder()
043          .name("arg2")
044          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
045          .zeroOrOne()
046          .build())
047      .allowUnboundedArity(true)
048      .returnType(IStringItem.class)
049      .returnOne()
050      .functionHandler(FnConcat::execute)
051      .build();
052
053  private FnConcat() {
054    // disable construction
055  }
056
057  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
058  @NonNull
059  private static ISequence<IStringItem> execute(
060      @NonNull IFunction function,
061      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
062      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
063      IItem focus) {
064
065    return ISequence.of(concat(ObjectUtils.notNull(arguments.stream()
066        .map(arg -> {
067          assert arg != null;
068          return (IAnyAtomicItem) arg.getFirstItem(true);
069        }))));
070  }
071
072  /**
073   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
074   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-concat">fn:concat</a>.
075   *
076   * @param items
077   *          the items to concatenate
078   * @return the atomized result
079   */
080  @NonNull
081  public static IStringItem concat(IAnyAtomicItem... items) {
082    return concat(ObjectUtils.notNull(Arrays.asList(items)));
083  }
084
085  /**
086   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
087   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-concat">fn:concat</a>.
088   *
089   * @param items
090   *          the items to concatenate
091   * @return the atomized result
092   */
093  @NonNull
094  public static IStringItem concat(@NonNull List<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> items) {
095    return concat(ObjectUtils.notNull(items.stream()));
096  }
097
098  /**
099   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
100   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-concat">fn:concat</a>.
101   *
102   * @param items
103   *          the items to concatenate
104   * @return the atomized result
105   */
106  @NonNull
107  public static IStringItem concat(@NonNull Stream<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> items) {
108    return IStringItem.valueOf(ObjectUtils.notNull(items
109        .map(item -> {
110          return item == null ? "" : IStringItem.cast(item).asString();
111        })
112        .collect(Collectors.joining())));
113  }
114}
